name: MonGirl Expedition
description:
Jack’s simple life ends on his birthday with a surprise. He ends up in an unknown land full of monster girls with a task from the Goddess herself. Will he be able to impress her?



Of course, this quest won’t be simple, but Jack will meet a lot of attractive girls along the way. Will they become just friends or something more? It’s up to you! Duke it out in dynamic real-time combat, solve puzzles, meet girls, and conquer their hearts!



  • 30 unique H scenes to unlock with more than 913 CG frames and simple, togglable animations
  • 7 cute and gorgeous girls for you to meet and have fun with from a fluffy kitsune to a delicate kitty!
  • Change how girls look! 20 different dresses, each one with unique visual art.
  • Dynamic real-time combat instead of a turn-based system.
  • Several endings based on your choices and your favorite girl.
  • 199 game zones to loot and explore full of interesting stuff like puzzles and minigames!
